Description:
PARKSIDE LIVING – PRICE REDUCED - VENDOR MEETING THE MARKET
Here is a great homesite overlooking a lovely park with playground facilities ready for you to enjoy. Highlighted by mature gum trees this tranquil setting is surrounded by established homes so no need to endure the frantic building and noise associated with the construction of new homes. A level allotment close to the M1 freeway interchange, public transport passes on Brunt Road, with schools & shopping centres close, come and enjoy the fresh country air at this great location. Owner wants it sold.

Description:
4 Bedroom Home in Park Central Estate
This modern and stylish home fantastically situated in the Park Central Estate, is sure to tick all the boxes for first or second home buyers and investors alike. Offering a great floor plan that allows for easy living, the home consists of four spacious bedrooms plus a study nook, multiple living zones, two bathrooms, a double car lock up garage, open plan dining, kitchen and living. Furthermore, the home features ducted heating, evaporative cooling, new fitted wardrobes in all the bedrooms, stainless steel appliances and ample bench space in the kitchen. The outside area is also sure to impress with manicured gardens, a decking area and undercover pergola perfect for family entertaining. The location is second to none, being conveniently located within close proximity to shops, freeway access, public transport and great schools – contact Jack on 0468 958 463 for further information.

Description:
READY SET GO! BRAND-SPANKING-NEW!
* BE THE FIRST TO LIVE IN * SURPRISINGLY SPACIOUS*
* SMELL THE BRAND NEW CARPETS & PAINTWORK*
* PERFECT FIRST HOME/INVESTMENT/ DOWNSIZER*
* SUPERB VALUE FOR MONEY*
As a First Home Buyer, you can expect stamp duty savings plus the applicable government rebate.
If you are an Investor, look forward to full depreciation advantages from the get go.
About the HOME...
Construction has literally just been completed, built by one of Victoria’s most reputable builders; JG KING HOMES, this superb townhouse is modern & spacious boasting approx 20 squares of living & comprises :-
- Exclusive 50 year Bluescope Steel structural guarantee
- 7 year builders warranty
- Modern facade design
- 2 living spaces ground floor
- Caeserstone kitchen benchtop, glass splashbacks, island breakfast bar
- Stainless steel appliances including dishwasher
- 4 upstairs bedrooms plus 2 bathrooms
- Downstairs Powder room
- Under-Stairwell generous storage area
- Split system air conditioning & heating
- Programable panel heaters to all bedrooms
- Laminate timber flooring
- Neutral colour palette throughout
- Window blinds, flyscreens & window locks
- 2 TVpoints & 2Telephone points plus Fibre to the home (FTTH)
- Easy maintenance rear courtyard
- Secure garage with internal access
- Solar hot water system
- Termite protection, plus more...
About the LOCATION...
Join the premium masterplanned community of Arcadia Estate in the booming suburb of Officer, boasting natural surroundings with the convenience of urban living. All within a few short minutes to :-
- Shops, Medical centres & freeway access
- Officer & Cardinia Road Train stations
- Officer Secondary college & Primary schools
- An abundance of parks, reserves & open spaces
Walk to The Club Officer Boardwalk Cafe & Bistro, enjoy the picturesque lake & wetlands teaming with wildlife plus the new Officer Town Centre is set to thrive featuring a proposed shopping complex with cafes, aquatic, youth & community centres, library, arts space, cinema plus more.
Don’t delay! Priced for immediate sale with 30/45/60 day settlement terms. Why buy second hand when you can buy BRAND NEW with full home warranty!
Call Michael or Brenda Studd - The Real Estate Studds - for your very own private viewing or we look forward to seeing you at the next scheduled Open For Inspection!

Description:
Captain! Land Ahoy!
Alex Scott & Staff are proud to present Lot 40 set on a massive 512m2. Be quick to secure your lot in this exclusive and highly sought after estate. Officer Heights offers excellent street appeal, breath taking views and plenty of park land and open greenspace. This estate wont fail to impress. With views out to Westernport Bay and close proximity to St Francis Xavier College, St Clare's Primary School, Arena Shopping Centre, Lakeside train station and easy access to Princes Highway and the Freeway, this is an opportunity not to be missed. With Limited lots available this opportunity will not last long.
Whilst every care is taken to supply accurate information our company cannot be held responsible for any incorrect information. It is recommended you satisfy yourself on the accuracy of the content and make your investigations

Description:
Architectural Design + Parkland Frontage
First home buyers, families and investors will delight in this contemporary abode offering a bright and stylish place to call home. The architectural design focuses on natural light and chic interiors with quality fittings and fixtures throughout.
Great first impressions are made from the moment you arrive with the residence's striking facade overlooking a parkland frontage. Inside, the well-planned layout commences with an open kitchen, meals and living area that connects with the timber decked courtyard to create a seamless flow of space to live, entertain and relax. The streamlined kitchen affords a 4-burner gas cooktop, underbench oven, dishwasher, double bowl sink and wall pantry as well as a breakfast bar perfect for casual meals and catch ups with friends. Towards the rear of the home is the laundry with downstairs WC, handy under stair storage space and a double garage with convenient internal access.
Head upstairs to find a master bedroom with triple wall robe, private ensuite and balcony, two additional bedrooms with built in robes, a study nook and a family bathroom with bath, shower, vanity and toilet. Four split system air conditioners and a bonus wall heater provide year round comfort for the whole family whilst an alarm system offers that extra peace of mind and modern downlights and roller blinds complete the home.
A prime position concludes this superb package; walking distance to the fantastic amenities of Arena Shopping Centre, Arena Park, Lakeside Recreation Reserve, Cardinia Road Train Station and Pakenham Lakeside Primary School as well as being only minutes to more great local schools, Lakeside Square and easy Princes Highway access.
Whether you want to start out in style, need an easy-care family home or an appealing investment property, this stunning home is sure to please even the most fastidious of buyers.
Call us now for more information or come to the next open for inspection and see it for yourself!

Description:
PRIVATE, EASY-CARE LIFESTYLE
This home has been well designed and is a spacious single level property that is low maintenance. It is tailor made for downsizers, first homebuyers or an investor wanting to capitalise on the superb Officer locale. The focal point of the home is the open plan kitchen meals and living area. The kitchen is modern with ample bench space, stainless steel appliances and walk in pantry.
Featuring 3 bedrooms master with en-suite and walk in robe, other 2 bedrooms with built in robes. Additional features include: roller blinds, gas ducted heating, air conditioning, stone benches in ensuite, flyscreens, security doors front and back and remote single garage with internal access. This modern home is a polished package, save yourself the hassle of building and move straight in.
Nestled in the sought-after Arcadia estate, close to parklands, top primary and secondary schools and the Officer shopping area.
Block size 300 sqm

Description:
Contemporary Home with Potential Side Access!
Demonstrating perfection in the highly sought-after Arcadia Estate, presents this beautifully presented family home with modern façade tailored with brilliant inclusions and a cleverly designed floorplan to provide exceptional living the whole family will enjoy.
The contemporary kitchen is tailored with stainless steel appliances, tiled splashback, ample bench space, Ceasarstone benchtops, dishwasher and finished with brilliant fixtures and fittings.
When open plan is a must, this home has it all. A spacious light filled living and dining area with sliders leading out to the covered alfresco area, creating an indoor-outdoor living experience.
The master bedroom fitted with walk in robe and private ensuite. Additional three bedrooms all equipped with walk in robes and serviced by the main bathroom.
If entertaining is what you like, this spacious backyard with a covered outdoor entertaining area. Making it a perfect addition for your summer barbeques with family and friends.
Ducted heating and split system cooling, double remote-control garage with rear roller door access and internal access and the added benefit of potential side access. All situated on approximately 418m2 block, no expense has been spared.
When location is everything, look no further! Excellently situated within 150m from Bridgewood Primary School, approx 500m from Officer Secondary College and walking distance to shopping centres, transport and parks, this home is exactly what you have been looking for.
Call Angelia now to schedule an inspection or see us at one of our opens!

Description:
20 ACRES OF IDYLIC LIFESTYLE
This superb property boasts 20 acres of fully cleared rolling pastured hills perfectly set up for horses with a lovely rural aspect, stunning views and privacy creating a serene lifestyle. In close proximity to Beaconsfield Upper and Beaconsfield's vibrant hub boasting quality schools both public and private, public transport and all desired amenities offering the best of both worlds.
With two sperate residences comprising the main dwelling, which boasts a family friendly floor plan, recently renovated throughout and upgraded with all new double glazed windows. Showcasing a fully appointed stone kitchen with quality appliances inclusive of 900ml freestanding oven, D/W and ample storage, two separate living zones and four generous bedrooms, master with en-suite and walk in robes and built in’s to all secondary rooms.
Additional desired features include wood heater, reverse cycle split systems throughout, outdoor covered entertaining area and double remote garage.
The second residence is a lovely neat, fully self-contained one bedroom unit, perfect for extended family, older children or simply to lease out.
The quality and style indoors is complimented by the outdoor living which showcases 13 fully usable paddocks, excellent fencing, all weather round yard under lights, 100,000lt water capacity, bore & dam which feeds all the extenal water taps and paddock toughs as well as good shedding to complete the improvements.

Description:
Immaculate Carlisle home - 3 living areas
Split over two spacious levels, this superb Carlisle home plays host to a convenient, low maintenance lifestyle situated in the beautiful Arena Estate. Boasting three living spaces, modern neutral tones throughout and a prime location – this property is perfect to accommodate the growing family and will tick every box.
First Floor features:
- Separate formal lounge.
- Large open plan family living area.
- Gorgeous designer kitchen featuring walk in pantry, 900mm oven with 5 burner gas cooktop, dishwasher, 20mm stone benches, breakfast bar and plenty of cupboard space.
- Fantastic alfresco for integrated outdoor entertaining.
- Generous backyard for kids and pets to play.
- Powder room for guests.
Second Floor Features:
- Generous Master suite including walk-in robe, private balcony and en-suite with twin vanity basins.
- Three more large bedrooms all including built in robes.
- 3rd lounge / retreat to relax or perfect for parents to get away.
- Well-equipped family bathroom.
EXTRAS: Evaporative cooling and ducted heating, remote double garage, shower niche to family bathroom, low maintenance gardens and much more.
And if all of this isn't enough – wait until you see the location! The home is position perfect and is easily within 300m of the Arena Shopping Centre complex and public transport, walking distance to plenty of parks and children's play areas and just a short drive to the many local schools in the area. What more could you need!

Description:
39sqs of Luxurious Living
Positioned perfectly and overlooking parklands, this consummate modern masterpiece is only 2 years young and offers an aspirational family lifestyle with its grand design, quality appointments and outstanding indoor/outdoor entertaining.
The residence showcases open plan living creating a magnificent sense of space and comfort, a master chef’s kitchen with stone benchtops, 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, innovative storage solutions and separate walk in pantry. A generous meals area flows effortlessly into a spacious living room. With an additional sitting area situated at the front of the home, ensuring all members of the family feel at home.
If movies are your thing, then lock yourself away in the theatre room fitted with surround sound, quality projector and screen and lose yourself in a good film with a tub of popcorn while the world passes by.
Flowing on from the main living are beautiful stacker doors open to the outdoor covered alfresco space overlooking the stunning landscaped backyard with additional courtyard completing this fantastic family abode.
The upper level comprises of a spacious rumpus for the kids, an outstanding master suite with his and hers walk in robes and full ensuite with oversized shower. Spacious three bedrooms all with built in robes and are serviced by the main bathroom.
A beautiful balcony overlooks the park opposite creating a beautiful aspect for you and your family.
Impressive comforts to enjoy including, but not limited to: zoned ducted heating and cooling, double remote garage with internal and external access, NBN data points through the home, LCD downlights throughout, 3 phase electricity installed, BOSE speakers in alfresco, quality flooring and tiling throughout the home. Situated close to freeways, schools, shopping centres, cafes, restaurants, public transport and much more, this home has it all.
This beautiful home is not one to be missed and is ready for you to make memories of your own!

Description:
STYLISH GEM – OFFICER
This newly completed home has been built with luxury in mind and includes a modern deluxe kitchen with stone bench tops, breakfast bar, 90cm canopy hood, stainless steel appliances and walk in pantry that will inspire the chef of the family.
Featuring 3 bedrooms master with en-suite and walk in robe, other 2 bedrooms with built in robes. The main living/dining/kitchen areas opens onto to the alfresco area with a neat decked area and garden, the perfect atmosphere for indoor/outdoor living. A formal living area is an added bonus. Additional features include: Modern fixtures and fittings, LED lighting, high ceilings, gas ducted heating, air conditioning cooling throughout, outdoor fan and remote single garage with internal access.
Outdoors the property sits on a a 294M2 block with manicured gardens. This modern home is a polished package, save yourself the hassle of building and move straight in to this completed home that is just a year old.
Nestled in the sought-after Arcadia estate, close to Harmony Place Park, Officer train station, Bridgewood Primary School, Officer Secondary College and the Arena shopping area.
Block size 294 sqm

Description:
Quality, elegance & all class
Beautifully designed to achieve low maintenance living and natural simplicity. This quality 2-year-old SJD home is perfectly suited to first home buyers, investors and growing families. This executive 'as new’ three-bedroom residence is positioned in the magnificent Grandvue estate in Officer which showcases the ultimate family lifestyle with parklands, St Francis Xavier College just minutes away and a short distance to the Arena shopping centre where you have a variety of take away options, M1 freeway and Cardinia train station.
Beyond the stunning modern façade, sits three superb bedrooms and two separate living zones, including a spectacular master suite complete with walk in robes and luxurious ensuite, the other two bedrooms boast an ample amount of floorspace and built in robes serviced by the deluxe floor to ceiling tiles family bathroom and separate toilet to accommodate family and guests.
Introduced by exquisite high ceilings and quality flooring leading you through to the open plan kitchen living and dining. The designer kitchen is bound to impress the house hold cook, offering a practical lay out and features quality appliances that include 900mm oven/ stove top, stone benchtops, dishwasher, plenty of bench and preparation space as well as the added luxury of your own walk in pantry. Internal features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, LED lighting, exposed concrete driving, that’s just to name a few.
Sliding doors open up to a beautifully manicured rear yard, ready for you to create and complete the perfect setup for entertaining and relaxing. This home offers side gate access and a double remote garage with internal & external access allowing you to store your cars and trailers securely. All situated on a 449m2 approx. allotment.
If quality, elegance and class is what you’re searching for than this is the perfect home for you. Arrange an inspection as this is one you won’t want to miss.

Description:
Entertainers Dream with Room for the Boat/Caravan!
Stop looking for that flawless property…. You've finally found it! Indulge in this perfectly presented residence situated in one of the fastest growing suburbs in the Casey Corridor. A stunning three-bedroom home built as the impeccable palace for the entertainer! Amenities are in ample with parklands, local shops, freeway access and public transport just a stone throw away.
This luxurious property is an architecturally designed masterpiece covering every aspect you desire. Starting with the generous accommodation enjoy three well-proportioned bedrooms. The master is substantial featuring walk-in robes and prestige ensuite with double vanities. Furthermore, the secondary bedrooms are no less impressive with their own family bathroom to match.
Walking into the home enjoy the large living area full of natural light, which wraps around into the centre of the home. Bake, make and decorate with the kitchen featuring waterfall benchtops, brand new appliances, plenty of storage and butler's pantry. The open planned meals and living area with wood fire place perfect for servicing the family. Outside is the showstopper with a stunning decked entertaining area equipped with bar and shutters and blinds for year-round use. Adjacent to the entertaining area you have secure storage with a 5-metre gate wide enough all the toys you yearn for sure as a 25ft caravan or boat. Creature comforts include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 6kw solar system and all wrapped up on a 475m2 (approx.) block. A home of this calibre is hard to find, so call now to book your inspection!

Description:
Luxury All The Way
This inspired Halifax home is only approximately twelve months old and oozes style and sophistication. Upon entry you will be greeted by the spacious entrance, open study area, double bedroom with built in robes, bathroom with wall to wall tiles plus separate toilet. The ultra modern kitchen has stunning waterfall stone benchtops, all the mod cons including your very own barista built in coffee machine, and overlooks huge family/living area.
Upstairs there is a great sized rumpus with views overlooking the neighbouring D'Angelo vineyard, central bathroom with wall to wall tiles, a further three bedrooms including a de-lux master bedroom with both built in and walk in robes and stunning full ensuite – and if your thinking the master has a private balcony with expansive views to Westernport Bay, you would be correct!
Outside, the timber and stone theme continues. The huge alfresco area is complete with built in bar and basin for all your entertaining needs and overlooks the in-ground solar pool with immaculate landscaping and adjoining private yard. All of this in the ever popular Timbertop estate in very quiet location close to schools, shops and Monash Freeway.
Additional Features Include – Huge double remote garage with internal access, central heating and cooling on both levels, keyless entry to the property, CCTV, garden shed and stone water feature.
Contact : Adrian Hall 0417 123 820

Description:
BRAND NEW IN TIMBERTOP
Boasting an elevated position in Officer’s most sought-after estate and opposite native parkland’s that will never be built upon you will find this stunning brand new home. Upon stepping foot into the home the tone is set with an expansive, light filled hallway with beautiful timber floorboards which flow throughout. The generous Master suite is located at the front of the home with fitted out walk-in-robe and a stylish full ensuite which wouldn’t look out of place on “The Block”. Moving through the hallway you will find a large bedroom on the left and the first of 3 living areas presents itself to you on your right. Stepping down into the heart of the home you are greeted with soaring ceilings and stunning chefs kitchen featuring stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances and walk in pantry. The light filled open-plan meals and living area opens out onto the welcoming deck giving a great sense of space and grandeur. Off the hallway you will find 2 spacious bedrooms with built in robes, which share the family bathroom and the third living area which is perfect for a kids playroom. The home features a triple garage, ducted heating, and evaporative cooling all on 613m2 of prime Timbertop land. Don’t hesitate in booking your inspection to avoid disappointment.
Insights: 8 Cowdray Crescent, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2018 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
10 acre development site in Officer PSP
This is a great opportunity to invest in the Officer PSP and purchase a future development site of approximately 10 acres.
FEATURES
• Premium site with substantial future uplift or potential development in the near future.
• Excellent transportation links to Melbourne CBD and surrounding metro suburbs.
• Minutes from Officer train station.
• Short drive to already established Officer amenities.
• Excellent future returns due to strong continuous growth in the South East corridor.
A very simple equation, this property wont last long!
For further information regarding this parcel of land please contact
Rajinder Singh at 0451818439
Gurpyar Sidhu at 0423425436

Description:
SIMPLY STUNNING IN EVERY DETAIL
EX DISPLAY IN TIMBER TOP
This four-year-old ex display Yarrabank home has been built with luxury in mind. This blue-chip location with perfect kerb appeal features 3 double bedrooms + a study. The master has walk in robe, ensuite with double basin and double shower. Remaining 3 bedrooms have their own wing and a super modern bathroom with dual vanities. Living spaces consists of sunken all-inclusive of home theatre room and system for entertaining the family. A central living space is dazzling with the kitchen/dining/living room being the hub of the home and showcased by a stunning raked ceiling with excellent natural light.
You will enjoy cooking in this modern deluxe kitchen with quantum quartz stone benchtops, soft close cabinets and stainless-steel appliances.
The main living / dining area has sliding door access to a beautifully positioned alfresco with café blinds and a professionally landscaped easy-care garden, the ideal setting to relax in the private outdoor living area.
This modern home is a polished package with many upgrades that come with ex display homes and includes: Double remote garage, breakfast bar, home theatre system, ducted gas heating, split system air conditioning, appealing timber look floors, modern décor, quality carpet, CCTV, weathermatic water system and more.
Located in Timbertop Estate you are minutes to the freeway and Beaconsfield shopping area.
Save yourself the time and hassle of building and move straight in.
Insights: 6 Marwood Way, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2018 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.
